text: Stronger than yesterday! February 16 marks ten years since that fateful day Britney Spears hit rock bottom and shaved her head at Esther ’ s Haircutting Studio in Tarzana, California. Take a look back at the pop princess ’ public breakdown, how she has since reclaimed her throne and all the moments in between in the video above, and detailed below. The date was February 16, 2007. Spears, then 25, walked into the hair salon at approximately 7 p. m. and asked owner Esther Tognozzi to shave off her then - brunette locks, just one day after checking herself in and out of rehab.
